meta.name: description
meta.content: The Blue Valley School District provides education beyond expectations for students in Overland Park, Leawood and Olathe, Kansas.

var multimediaGallery39019 = { "props": { "defaultGallery": true, "imageWidth" : 960, "imageHeight" : 500, "pageModuleInstanceId": "39019", "moduleInstanceId": "38852", "virtualFolderPath": "/cms/lib/ks02212623/Centricity/ModuleInstance/38852/" }, "records": [ { "flexDataId": "50834", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "BV issues first bonds from 2020 referendum, refunds bonds saving taxpayers $2.39 million", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "On Monday, April 13, the Blue Valley Board of Education issued the first bonds from the 2020 bond referendum passed by district voters on January 28, 2020. The principal amount of bonds sold in the 2020-A series was $125 million with an interest rate of 2.151220%. The Board also issued $12.485 million in general obligation refunding bonds in an effort to secure a lower interest rate and savings for taxpayers. The new lower interest rate will save district taxpayers $2.39 million in interest payments. ", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/ks02212623/Centricity/Domain/8/Copy of Copy of Bond FB Event Cover.png", "imageWidth": "600", "imageHeight": "250", "imageAltText": "Bond logo", "isLinked": "True", "linkUrl": "https://www.bluevalleyk12.org/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&ModuleInstanceID=38435&ViewID=7b97f7ed-8e5e-4120-848f-a8b4987d588f&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=50835&PageID=34288", "linkText": "Read the press release", "openLinkInNewWindow": "True", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "50768", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Mark your calendar, April 20 is now a school day", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Blue Valley Schools is making an adjustment to the 2019-20 school calendar. Monday, April 20 will now be a school day for students. For more information about the calendar, or to subscribe to the district calendar.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/ks02212623/Centricity/Domain/8/School in session.png", "imageWidth": "600", "imageHeight": "250", "imageAltText": "Calendar of April 2020", "isLinked": "True", "linkUrl": "https://www.bluevalleyk12.org/Page/10#calendar38346/20200413/month", "linkText": "View the calendar", "openLinkInNewWindow": "True", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "50762", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "ALL Blue Valley grounds closed", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "In an abundance of caution, the district has closed all district grounds and facilities to reduce the transmission of the COVID-19 virus. All district outdoor fields, tracks, courts and grounds are closed and gates to school grounds will be locked until further notice. In addition, district playgrounds remain closed.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/ks02212623/Centricity/Domain/8/Copy of Copy of Blue Valley Playgrounds Remain Closed.png", "imageWidth": "600", "imageHeight": "250", "imageAltText": "picture of a playground", "isLinked": "False", "linkUrl": "", "linkText": "", "openLinkInNewWindow": "False", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "48550", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Last day of school announced", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "The last day of school has been determined for 2019-2020. The last day of classes for Blue Valley seniors is May 15. The last day for students in grades K-11 is on May 22. Early childhood’s last day is May 21.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/ks02212623/Centricity/Domain/8/Blue Valley Logo1-cropped2.jpg", "imageWidth": "600", "imageHeight": "250", "imageAltText": "Blue Valley logo", "isLinked": "True", "linkUrl": "https://www.bluevalleyk12.org/Page/10#calendar38346/20200330/month", "linkText": "View the district calendar", "openLinkInNewWindow": "True", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "50634", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "New Hours for Grab-and-Go Breakfasts and Lunches", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Beginning Monday, April 6, free grab-and-go hours will change. Breakfast and lunch service will now be available weekdays from 11 a.m. – 12:30 p.m. at four locations across the district. Visit the district website, download the Nutrislice app or check out the BV Schools app for more information.", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/ks02212623/Centricity/Domain/8/grabandgo3.png", "imageWidth": "600", "imageHeight": "250", "imageAltText": "Grab and go breakfast and lunch infographic", "isLinked": "True", "linkUrl": "https://www.bluevalleyk12.org/Page/35432", "linkText": "View more information about Grab-and-Go ", "openLinkInNewWindow": "True", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, { "flexDataId": "50709", "hideTitle": "False", "title": "Blue Valley School District Continuous Learning Plan", "hideCaption": "False", "caption": "Blue Valley Schools understands the importance of keeping students engaged in learning amid COVID-19 school building closures. Blue Valley is transitioning to a Continuous Learning Plan--a plan that provides at-home learning opportunities and supports students in new ways", "imageSrc": "/cms/lib/ks02212623/Centricity/Domain/8/clpwebannouncemenr final.png", "imageWidth": "600", "imageHeight": "250", "imageAltText": "continuous learning logo", "isLinked": "True", "linkUrl": "https://www.bluevalleyk12.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=35373", "linkText": "View the Continuous Learning webpage", "openLinkInNewWindow": "True", "videoLinkText": "", "videoIsEmbedded": "False", "videoIframe": "" }, {}] };
